As part of our workshops and courses, great construction projects are implemented in the group. We hardly notice gender-specific differences, because creativity, teamwork and spatial imagination are what are required above all! If girl or boy – the participants are completely absorbed in their task and master the challenge together. This creates a sense of achievement, strengthens the sense of community and trains logical thinking as well as important problem-solving skills.

Pretty cool huh video games how Minecraft – purposefully used – for digital education can do! besides digital educationit is also important to us as a HABA digital workshop that gender no longer plays a role in the choice of leisure activities, studies or work in the future.

Also Minecraft itself makes a contribution to breaking down gender-specific prejudices. That’s how the characters are in Minecraft, the so-called skins, are neutral – they cannot be assigned to a specific gender. So should too girl be motivated to engage in the experience in virtual space. Then girl can play just as well as boys!
